title: Love Poem Competition! + Ryan Hurd And Maren Morris Perform New Duet In Studio + Eddie Wants To Wear Something Controversial
itunes:title: Love Poem Competition! + Ryan Hurd And Maren Morris Perform New Duet In Studio + Eddie Wants To Wear Something Controversial
description:
Bobby had all the guys write poems to their wives. They each recite them and we pick a winner for the most romantic. Ryan Hurd and Maren Morris stop by the studio to perform their new duet and talk about their latest TV binge. Plus, Eddie wants to wear something controversial in the studio!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
